import React from "react"; const Arrow = () => ( ); const Hero = () => (
{/* Gradient Backgrounds */}
{/* Avatar - ย้ายมาด้านซ้าย */}
{/* Text Content - ย้ายมาด้านขวา */}
Hello! I Am Saranyapong Wongwanich

A Designer who

Judges a book
by its cover..

Because if the cover does not impress you what else can?

); export default Hero;
